detaileddescription.para: Canonicalize the option set apply the general resource properties

Add an option with a higher precedence than "this" object. Modify this object according to the following "add" semantics and return the modified object: For each option key in o which has a non-default value, override the same key in this object.

parameterdescription.para: an option set object with a higher precedence.

detaileddescription.para:
Comparator function to make this whole class be used as a functor allowing an upper class to call parse() with a specific iteration order among key-value pairs.
k1
reference key
k2
comparing key
true if k1 should precede k2 during iteration.
Parse the value string (v) according to the key string (k). The parsed results are stored in "this" object.

parameterdescription.para: parsing info and warning string to return.

detaileddescription.para: Return the set option parameters as an JSON string
